# gravity

**Type Property**

Returns the gravity unit of acceleration.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying class var gravity: UnitAcceleration { get }
```

## Accessing Predefined Units

- **metersPerSecondSquared**: Returns the meter per second squared unit of acceleration.
